story_99_00030/2401_1001_0100_10:
Welcome! Since you’re a first-time customer,
we’d like to offer you a Training Machine
free of charge!
story_99_00030/2401_1001_0200_10:
By the way, you can use Training Machines to...
you guessed it! Train with your partner
Pokémon to improve their strength!
story_99_00030/2401_1001_0300_10:
Why don’t you try using this Training Machine
to teach your Pikachu a new move!
story_99_00030/2401_1001_0400_10:
Wow! Nice work!
Your Pikachu looks stronger than ever!
story_99_00030/2401_1001_0500_10:
Yep! That Training Machine sure seems to have
done the trick. I’ll have to keep plenty in stock!
Come again soon!
